name: Gas Leak Detector with Flashlight Gooseneck, Rechargeable Natural Gas Leak Detector with LED Digital, Alert, Locating The Source Like Propane, Methane, LPG and Butane for Industrial, Home Kitchen RV
short_description: Flexible Probe with High-Intensity Inspection Light: Equipped with a 7.87 inch bendable gooseneck and 4 powerful LED bulbs at its tip, this gas leak detector solves the challenge of inspecting dark, confined spaces. The probe bends to reach behind appliances, inside ducts, or under RVs, while the focused LED light brightly illuminates potential leak points. The flashlight can help you conduct perfect detection in dark emvironment. Ideal for sewer gas detector use and RV propane gas detector applications, it ensures no hidden leak goes unnoticed. It is also specialized in gasoline vapor detection (not liquid gasoline) and works effectively for leak detection in gasoline-powered vehicles

Long-Lasting Battery & Multi-Gas Identification: Powered by a 1000mAh rechargeable battery with USB-C charging, this gas leak detector is designed for long-term use, promising that you won't have to worry about running out of battery power. When the battery level icon on the display is empty, it' s time to recharge the gas leak detector. Its advanced sensor accurately identifies over 10 combustible gases, including natural gas, propane, LPG, butane, hydrogen, ammonia, benzene and methane. Therefore, you don't need to purchase multiple detectors. This gas leak detector can serve as a versatile combustible gas detector for kitchens, camping, travel, and emergency preparedness

Clear Dual Display : The clear digital screen can accurately show four numbers, helping you precisely monitor the concentration of combustible gases in the air, so that you can take appropriate measures at any time. Experience dual-mode gas detection excellence with our detector—seamlessly switch between %LEL (0~20%, explosion prevention) and PPM (early leak protection) to cover all safety needs. Equipped with a built-in temperature display (°C/°F switchable), it eliminates the need for extra thermometers. Whether it' s for your home kitchen, outdoor camping trips, or industrial workspaces, this gas leak detector is your all-in-one solution to meet all your safety needs

Customize Your Alarm Thresholds: when gas levels rise, the system triggers loud audible, bright visual, and on-screen alerts. Need quiet operation? One click turns off indicators and sounds without compromising safety. Perfect as a propane leak detector for home or for monitoring HVAC systems, it keeps you informed and protected 24/7

Wide-Range Detection with Dual Sensitivity Modes: Featuring a professional sensor with a 1–10000 ppm range, this gas leak detector offers two smart sensitivity settings. Use High-Sensitivity Mode to catch minor leaks early, or Low-Sensitivity Mode to avoid false alarms in high-background areas. This reliable gas sniffer provides accurate readings for both home use and industrial gas leak detection, delivering confidence in every environment

Ergonomic Design & Complete Ready-to-Use Kit: Designed for comfortable, secure handling even in low light, this gas leak detector features intuitive buttons and a non-slip grip. The kit includes the detector, charging cable, protective case, and manual—everything needed to start detecting right away. Backed by a 1-year warranty, this natural gas leak detector is a trusted tool for homeowners, inspectors, and RV users alike

name: Natural Gas Detector with 18-Inch Gooseneck, Gas Leak Detector for Home, Gas Sniffer with Temp/Humidity, Audible & Visual Alarm, Locating The Source Like Propane Methane for RV (Includes Battery x6)
short_description: 18 Inches Flexible Probe & Temperature/Humidity Detection: Our gas leak detector features a flexible 18-inch gooseneck for easy access to hard-to-reach areas, ensuring a thorough safety inspection. It also includes temperature and humidity monitoring to maintain optimal operating conditions. (Note: Please allow 30 seconds to warm up before use)

Visual & Audible Alarms: The natural gas detector features 12 colorful indicator bars and a 75dB audio alarm system, providing multiple alerts for potential hazards. As gas concentrations rise, the alarm visually changes to indicate different safety levels while the sound intensifies to convey urgent information.

Low Battery Indication & Auto Off: The low battery reminder effectively prevents testing when the battery is insufficient, thus avoiding inaccurate measurements and potential safety hazards due to low power. To extend battery life, our propane leak detector features an intelligent auto-off function. If the gas sniffer remains inactive for 10 minutes, it will automatically shut down to prevent unnecessary power consumption.

User Friendly Features: The methane gas detector features high and low sensitivity modes for flexible selection based on your needs, enabling more accurate gas concentration analysis. It also includes temperature and humidity detection to help assess environmental conditions and gas leak risks.

Reliable Gas Leak Detector: In the package, you will receive 1x gas leak detector, 1x storage case, 1x user manual, 1x screwdriver and 6x AAA batteries (3 for backup). This detector is designed for families and can quickly identify combustible gas leaks. It is suitable for the detection of LPG, methane, propane, butane, natural gas and sewer gas, etc., to ensure the safety of your family.
